sentences.sContent: a company with an exemplary record on environmental issues
sentences.sCn: 在处理环境问题方面可作为楷模的公司

synos.tran: 典范的；惩戒性的；可仿效的

remMethod.val: ex(外) + empl(拿) + ary → 从外拿(例子)的 → 模范的

trans.tranOther: an exemplary punishment is very severe and is intended to stop other people from committing the same crime
